name: PDA Vault
description: Learn about Program Derived Addresses (PDAs) by building a vault that can hold lamports. This template demonstrates PDA derivation, seeds, and bump seeds.
learningGoals: Understand what Program Derived Addresses (PDAs) are
Learn how to derive PDAs using seeds
Learn how to store lamports in PDAs
Understand PDA account constraints in Anchor
Learn about cross-program invocations with PDAs
